body:
A while back, I went on to another server for a Twitch livestream (msg me for the IP; I'm not going to advertise!), and I saw Arkas from MindCrack on that server. After that, I thought of making an article where people can post screenshots, experiences, etc., of themselves finding or meeting other cool MineCraft users here. Hope you enjoy. =)



(P.S.: I meant to post this several weeks ago during the actual livestream in hopes that others could come and meet Arkas, but was unable to due to technical difficulties.)
body_tagged:

title: Anyone Seen Any Cool MineCrafters Online?

replies.body:
xNestorio. I 1v1ed him. Got him to 4 hearts while getting 10 fps =P. Man hes bad at sword =P.

EDIT: Just remembered I 1v1ed InfoLag and beat him, while he debuffed me =P. But afterwards I found out it was his first fight of the day, and he got pot lag =P
